title: Snow Day Malzahar Skin bug
body: So whenever you recall as Snow day malz, he lifts up the poro and truns him into his little creature, right? well right now, the poro and the creature have no color, they are just straight blue. You might want to change this

replies.body: Definitely a bug! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix! ^-^
Having the same problem, thought maybe my game was acting weird, it's just a blue silhouette
